poem:
Title: Currency of Strength

Zelenskiy addressed in Davos,
After upbeat caucus with global stellos,
"Fortify our markets," says he,
"augments your security."
One inquiry lingers in the echo,
"How may we aid you, in your shadow?"
Replies he, bold and sans dread,
"Bank on our people instead,
For they, like you, are bold, are brave,
Smart-witted, modern, free, not slave."
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Davos day one: Volodymyr Zelenskiy addresses WEF after ‘upbeat’ meeting with CEOs – business live 1.54pm GMT Zelenskiy: Strengthen our economy and we willl strengthen your security. Just time for one more question…. Q: You had 70 global CEOs in a room this morning (full details here) – what can we do to help you? Our main strength is our people, Volodymyr Zelenskiy replies, who have proved they are smart, talented, modern, smart-witted and brave.". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Davos day one: Volodymyr Zelenskiy addresses WEF after ‘upbeat’ meeting with CEOs – business live 1.54pm GMT Zelenskiy: Strengthen our economy and we willl strengthen your security. Just time for one more question…. Q: You had 70 global CEOs in a room this morning (full details here) – what can we do to help you? Our main strength is our people, Volodymyr Zelenskiy replies, who have proved they are smart, talented, modern, smart-witted and brave.
